Good day to all and a Happy Thanksgiving to whom it will apply!  Does 
anyo=
ne know of the process by which kogai were reformed to kozuka?  I 
have rec=
ently received a kozuka naoshi and I notice it has the same 
triangular tap=
er of standard kozuka and as I believe kogai are flat I 
am wondering how i=
t was re-constructed?  Thanks much!
Pete Klein
